title: List of the oldest buildings in Connecticut
text: This article lists the oldest buildings in the state of <a href="Connecticut">Connecticut</a> in the <a href="United%20States%20of%20America">United States of America</a> with Wikipedia articles. The dates of construction are based on land tax and probate records, architectural studies, <a href="genealogy">genealogy</a>, and <a href="dendrochronology">dendrochronology</a>. Buildings on the list should be limited to the <a href="First%20Period">First Period</a> of American architecture (before 1725). If the exact year of construction is estimated, or the building was built in phases, the date will be listed as a range.
